--- grant_on_change_stream_fqn.sql
GRANT SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM s.c TO ROLE r

--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnChangeStream{
    Select: 6,
    Names:  []*ast.Path{
      &ast.Path{
        Idents: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 30,
            NameEnd: 31,
            Name:    "s",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 32,
            NameEnd: 33,
            Name:    "c",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 42,
      NameEnd: 43,
      Name:    "r",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT SELECT ON CHANGE STREAM s.c TO ROLE r
